attributes.action: Make israel accountable for war crimes and crimes against humanity
attributes.background: The current situation in palestine has not been taken seriously in the western world, because of its affiliation and close relationship with its president. The government must seriously consider arresting the president of israel for crimes against humanity, and breaching the geneva code.

rejection.details:
Under UK and international law, visiting heads of foreign governments, such as Prime Minister Netanyahu, have immunity from legal process, and cannot be arrested or detained.

There is more information in the response to this petition: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/105446
